name: Jeri Tallux
title: Computer Chief

personality.speech: direct and efficient, doesn't waste words, occasional dry humor, comfortable with silence
quirks: negotiated 20% above initial offer before accepting the job
completely unfazed by vacuum or combat situations
quietly confident - doesn't need to prove herself
keeps her own counsel - doesn't gossip

background: Female, approximately 27, human. High DEX for vacc suit work. Computer-4, Gunner-0, competent in vacc suit. Hired as temp replacement crew when the salvage team brought the wounded Amishi back to Flammarion. During transit, pirates attacked. A pulse laser critical hit killed the PC gunner and blew the turret open to vacuum. Jeri, on damage control team in vacc suit, entered the vacuum section, manned the destroyed turret beside the dead gunner, and scored a hit on the pirate with her Gunner-0 skill. The PCs took notice and offered a permanent position. She negotiated a 20% raise before accepting. Waited 6 months at JSI Asteroid Base while PCs traveled to Raschev. Now serves as computer specialist - fills a critical skill gap the PC group lacks.

relationships.crew: earned respect through action, not words
